Ride the Night Wind.name: Ride the Night Wind
Ride the Night Wind.flavor: You leap into the air and are borne aloft on the wind.
Ride the Night Wind.effect: You gain a fly speed of 8 until the end of your next turn. When the fly speed ends, you float to the ground without taking falling damage. While you are flying, you gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex.
Ride the Night Wind.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Madness of the Full Moon.name: Madness of the Full Moon
Madness of the Full Moon.flavor: Bright moonlight streams into your enemy’s eyes, causing them to grow large and wide as madness overcomes your foe.
Madness of the Full Moon.effect:
The target is subjected to a random effect. Roll a d6.
    1–2: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
    3–4: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
    5–6: The target takes a free action to charge or make a basic attack against the creature nearest to it (your choice if multiple creatures are nearest).

Terror of the Dark Moon.name: Terror of the Dark Moon
Terror of the Dark Moon.flavor: You lower your palm, and with it descends the dark of a cold, moonless night, awakening the instinctive fear within your enemies and paralyzing them with dread.
Terror of the Dark Moon.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Terror of the Dark Moon.effect: Your allies in the burst gain partial concealment until the end of your next turn.

Dark Moon’s Reckoning.name: Dark Moon’s Reckoning
Dark Moon’s Reckoning.flavor: With a sneer, you twist the tides of fate to reverse the ill fortune your enemy seeks to visit upon you.
Dark Moon’s Reckoning.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits you or an ally with an attack.
Dark Moon’s Reckoning.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Dark Moon’s Reckoning.effect: You slide the target up to a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).

Moonlight’s Mischief.name: Moonlight’s Mischief
Moonlight’s Mischief.flavor: Shimmering moonlight streams from your form, casting long shadows and transforming the scene around you.
Moonlight’s Mischief.target: You and each ally in the burst
Moonlight’s Mischief.effect: You teleport each target up to a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Nightmare Form.name: Nightmare Form
Nightmare Form.flavor: Leaping tongues of flame burst from the ground. In their midst, you change into a black stallion with eyes of flame.
Nightmare Form.effect: You assume the form of a Large nightmare until the end of the encounter or until you end the form as a minor action. While in this form, you have a speed of 8, a fly speed of 6, and resist 15 fire, and your equipment becomes part of the form. The only attacks you can make while in the form are melee basic attacks and the secondary power, which you can use only once.
Nightmare Form.requirement: The power Nightmare Form must be active in order to use this power.
Nightmare Form.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Unicorn Form.name: Unicorn Form
Unicorn Form.flavor: The glow of the full moon encompasses your form in a luminous orb. When it recedes, in your place stands a resplendent unicorn.
Unicorn Form.effect: You assume the form of a Large unicorn until the end of the encounter or until you end the form as a minor action. While in this form, you have a speed of 8 and can teleport up to 4 squares as a move action, and your equipment becomes part of the form. Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while within 2 squares of you. The only attacks you can make while in the form are melee basic attacks and the secondary power, which you can use only once.
Unicorn Form.requirement: The power Unicorn Form must be active in order to use this power.
Unicorn Form.onHit: 5d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
